promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, single-word name for a dynamic simple boar steel-type pokemon wearing grey bracers. It can be found in desert-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, steel or boar. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Bracerusk, a a dynamic simple boar steel-type pokemon. It can be found in desert-like environments It has the following abilities: Metal Star, Attract Current. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "boar", "steel" or "Bracerusk". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of steel-type pokemon, boar-like, simple, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, grey shadows
generatedDescription: This hog-like metalloid dwells in arid lands, charging at the speed of a shooting star to generate magnetic surges for seeking mates.
